dcterms:creator: Hartmut Ehrig
Karsten Ehrig
Ulrike Prange
Gabriele Taentzer
dcterms:description: The Independent Parallelism Theorem establishes a bijective correspondence between sequential independent and parallel independent direct derivations in the Weak Double-Pushout framework.
dcterms:title: Independent Parallelism Theorem

dcterms:creator: Thierry Boy de la Tour
Rachid Echahed
dcterms:description: The Standard Parallelism Theorem provides an algebraic approach to true parallel graph transformations based on weak spans.
dcterms:title: Standard Parallelism Theorem

dcterms:creator: Jiří Adámek
Horst Herrlich
George E. Strecker
dcterms:description: Adhesive HLR categories are a framework used in the study of graph transformations, providing foundational concepts for the analysis of morphisms and structures.
dcterms:title: Adhesive HLR categories
